query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [ModuleName] nvarchar(max), [Responsibility] nvarchar(max), [Record] nvarchar(max), [RecordId] int, [RecordHyperlink] varchar(256), [Priority] int)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, ModuleName citext, Responsibility citext, Record citext, RecordId int, RecordHyperlink citext, Priority int)

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_Responsibilities temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId
